description: Prefect - modern workflow orchestration framework for Python

common_errors.solution: Check flow logs in Prefect UI, review exception traceback, verify task dependencies

common_errors.cause: Cannot connect to Prefect API (Cloud or Server)
common_errors.solution: Check PREFECT_API_URL and PREFECT_API_KEY, verify network connectivity

common_errors.cause: Work pool has no available workers or is misconfigured
common_errors.solution: Start worker with 'prefect worker start', check work pool configuration
Create deployment with 'prefect deploy', check deployment name in prefect.yaml
Register block with 'prefect block register' or create via UI/code
Check task logs, review retry configuration, verify task inputs

common_errors.cause: Missing Python dependency in flow environment
common_errors.solution: Install missing package, ensure dependencies in requirements.txt/pyproject.toml

common_errors.cause: Invalid or missing Prefect API key
common_errors.solution: Set PREFECT_API_KEY with valid key from Prefect Cloud, run 'prefect cloud login'
Wait for running flows to complete, increase concurrency limits if appropriate

common_errors.cause: Flow or task result cannot be serialized
common_errors.solution: Ensure return values are serializable, avoid closures over non-picklable objects
